content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate smelter at position(5.0, -70.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (5.0, -70.0).

### Copper plate smelter at position(15.0, -70.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (15.0, -70.0).

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing an entity without having it in inventory
- Ensure you have the entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting an item due to missing raw resources
- Ensure you have all the necessary raw resources (e.g., stone) in your inventory before attempting to craft an item that requires them. Some resources like stone cannot be crafted and must be harvested.

### Errors when crafting an item due to missing technology
- Ensure that you have researched the required technology before attempting to craft an item that requires it (e.g., assembling-machine-1 requires automation technology).

### Errors when crafting an item due to missing sub-ingredients
- When crafting an item, ensure that you have all the necessary sub-ingredients available. The error message will indicate which sub-ingredient is missing.

### Errors when getting an entity at a specific position
- Ensure that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to get it.

### Errors when inserting items into an entity
- Ensure that you have the item you are trying to insert in your inventory, and that the entity you are trying to insert into can accept that item.

# NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions:
None

### Important Variables:
None
```
